# AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.spatializeIfMono

**Case**

A mono input bus that renders as a point source at the location of the source node.

## Declaration

```swift
case spatializeIfMono
```

## Discussion

The system bypasses an input bus with more than one channel. This is equivalent to [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode/pointSource] for a mono bus and [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode/bypass] for a bus with more than one channel.

## Source Modes

- **AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.bypass**: A mode that does no spatial rendering.
- **AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.pointSource**: All channels of the bus render as a single source at the location of the source node.
- **AVAudio3DMixingSourceMode.ambienceBed**: The input channels spread around the listener as far-field sources that anchor to global space.
